name: The Dark Defender Demo
description:
GAME

The Dark Defender is an indie story-driven, 2D adventure game where you play as a character who has been deserted, with no recollection of your past. With the goal of figuring out who you are, you make your way through a world with friends to assist you on your journey, as well as enemies attempting to burden your adventure. On your path, you meet with various people, some wanting to help, some stopping you and some trying to make a quick buck off your ignorance. It is up to you to forge your path, to forge your confidence, risk-taking, determination and most of all, perseverance.
